# The `ValueFromPointerCast` Struct Template Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This cast trait provides casting for the specific case of casting to a value-typed object from a pointer-typed object. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>template &lt;typename To, typename From, typename Derived = void&gt;
struct llvm::ValueFromPointerCast&lt;To, From, Derived&gt;</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

This cast trait provides casting for the specific case of casting to a value-typed object from a pointer-typed object.

Note that <code>To</code> must be nullable/constructible from a pointer to <code>From</code> to use this cast.

Definition at line 329 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/casting-h">Casting.h</a>.
